list.description:
I thought once and found that Vilkas and BTR-4 are quite similar, so I decided to make a BTR-4 sight in War Thunder for it. since I did not find any sights like BTR-4 on wt-live

how to install: drop the BTR4.blk file into the alltanks folder
drop the VilkasBTR4 file into the tank_sight_presets folder

Both of these files are in the UserSights folder in the root game folder

Then go to the game, Tank combat settings - Sight settings - select the VilkasBTR4 preset at the top

Please note that this sight can be installed on any tank. but it was adjusted to the zoom of the Vilkas tank, a...

Gods greatest marksman sight - Ready to ROCK!

Update 1.1: Added bonus PSO modification for @Torvich

Hey again fellas!!
I have been pretty busy with summer classes after they've finally caught up with me, which unfortunately halted my usersight making for quite a bit. Thankfully I was able to finish all my tasks (for now) and finally get back to working my Ultimate Magnum Opus.

My 5th original usersight is the legendary PSO-1 Marksman scope made for the Dragunov SVD Sniper rifle, but translated into a usable WT usersight for rapid precision ...

Install guide : unzip in War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks folder ( if the folder does not exist - create it ) //

sight is also slightly customizable in-game //
